ingredients: 4 (6 ounce) salmon steaks, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large red onion, diced, 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, 2  tomatoes, diced, 1 sprig fresh cilantro, chopped, 2  mangos - peeled, seeded, and diced
nutrition: Total Fat 29g 37%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 99mg 33%, Sodium 107mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 24g 9%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 35g, Vitamin C 46mg 232%, Calcium 49mg 4%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 980mg 21%
